languages.text: "Ради чего? Что ждет меня в Империуме? Я — проклятая душа, мне лучше оставаться среди таких же проклятых душ. Но я благодарен вам за милосердие, Ваша Светлость".
"Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul and I should stay among souls as cursed as I am. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Ради чего? Что ждет меня в Империуме? Я — проклятая душа, мне лучше оставаться среди таких же проклятых душ. Но я благодарен вам за милосердие, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul, and I should stay among souls as cursed as I. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul and I should stay among souls as cursed as I am. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « À quoi bon ? Quel sera mon avenir, de retour dans l'Imperium ? Mon âme a été pervertie, et je devrais rester parmi les autres esprits maudits. Mais je vous suis profondément reconnaissant de votre mansuétude, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul and I should stay among souls as cursed as I am. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « À quoi bon ? Quel sera mon avenir, de retour dans l'Imperium ? Mon âme a été pervertie, et je devrais rester parmi les autres esprits maudits. Mais je vous suis profondément reconnaissant de votre mansuétude, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “这么做又是为了什么呢？帝国又会有什么东西在等着我呢？我的灵魂遭到了诅咒，我应该和其他遭到诅咒的怪物呆在一起。即便如此，我依然非常感激您的仁慈，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul and I should stay among souls as cursed as I am. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “这么做又是为了什么呢？帝国又会有什么东西在等着我呢？我的灵魂遭到了诅咒，我应该和其他遭到诅咒的怪物呆在一起。即便如此，我依然非常感激您的仁慈，大人。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「何のために？帝国に行ってどうなります？私は呪われた魂であり、同じように呪われた魂たちの中に留まるべきなのです。ともあれ、あなたの慈悲に感謝いたします、閣下」
languages.original_text: "Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul and I should stay among souls as cursed as I am. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「何のために？帝国に行ってどうなります？私は呪われた魂であり、同じように呪われた魂たちの中に留まるべきなのです。ともあれ、あなたの慈悲に感謝いたします、閣下」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Wozu denn? Was erwartet mich im Imperium? Meine Seele ist verflucht und ich sollte unter anderen verfluchten Seelen bleiben. Ich bin Euch trotzdem dankbar für Eure Gnade, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul and I should stay among souls as cursed as I am. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Wozu denn? Was erwartet mich im Imperium? Meine Seele ist verflucht und ich sollte unter anderen verfluchten Seelen bleiben. Ich bin Euch trotzdem dankbar für Eure Gnade, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «¿Para qué? ¿Qué me aguarda en el Imperium? Mi alma está maldita y debo permanecer entre almas igual de malditas que la mía. De todos modos agradezco su misericordia, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul and I should stay among souls as cursed as I am. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «¿Para qué? ¿Qué me aguarda en el Imperium? Mi alma está maldita y debo permanecer entre almas igual de malditas que la mía. De todos modos agradezco su misericordia, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Ne için? İmparatorluk'ta beni ne bekliyor? Lanetlenmiş bir ruhum ben... Benim yerim, benden hâllice lanetli ruhların yanıdır. Ancak merhametiniz için minnettarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "Whatever for? What awaits me in the Imperium? I am a cursed soul and I should stay among souls as cursed as I am. Regardless, I am grateful for your mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Ne için? İmparatorluk'ta beni ne bekliyor? Lanetlenmiş bir ruhum ben... Benim yerim, benden hâllice lanetli ruhların yanıdır. Ancak merhametiniz için minnettarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
